dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1661 IH: Discriminatory Gaming Tax Repeal Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Titus (for herself, Mr. Reschenthaler, Mr. Amodei, and Mr. Horsford) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise taxes on wagering.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Discriminatory Gaming Tax Repeal Act of 2023.

section.header: Repeal of excise taxes on wagering

subsection.text: Chapter 35 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (relating to taxes on wagering) is repealed.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2022.
